entry.title: Fix a broken mac terminal
entry.content:
Sometimes my Terminal gets broken by either displaying binary files, or sometimes caused by a broken ssh connection.

You can fix it by copy pasting the following line:

``` tput init tput reset reset

`` You might not see the charaters even after pasted to the terminal, but keep on pressENTER`, and suddenly your terminal is back to normal.
